00036 struct featurenotice_t {
00037    int m_drawOrder;
00038    bool m_border;
00039    const GfxFeature* m_feature;
00040    uint32 m_featureIndex;
00041    uint32 m_polygonIndex;
00042    const MapSetting* m_setting;         
00043    DrawSettings::poiStatus_t m_poiStatus;
00044    bool m_visible;
00045 };
00046 
00047 struct LessFeatureNoticeOrder:
00048       public binary_function<const featurenotice_t&, 
00049                              const featurenotice_t&, bool> {
00050    bool operator()(const featurenotice_t& x, 
00051                    const featurenotice_t& y) {
00052       return (x.m_drawOrder < y.m_drawOrder);
00053    }
00054 };
00055 
00056 struct LessNoticeFeatureIdOrder:
00057       public binary_function<const featurenotice_t&, const featurenotice_t&, bool> {
00058    bool operator()(const featurenotice_t& x, const featurenotice_t& y) {
00059       return (x.m_featureIndex < y.m_featureIndex);
00060    }
00061 };
